nodes.text: A masculine protocol droid served as the interpreter of Jabba Desilijic Tiure, a Hutt crime lord who led his own criminal empire, until he angered his master and was disintegrated, reducing the droid to a pile of scrap. Shortly before the Rescue of Han Solo in 4 ABY, EV-9D9, the supervisor of Jabba's Palace's droid pool, told C-3PO, Jabba's new interpreter, of his predecessor's fate and gestured towards the droid's remains, which had been dumped near the door of a furnace in her torture chamber.

The interpreter droid was first mentioned in the 1983 film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, and his remains appeared in Return of the Jedi: Beware the Power of the Dark Side!, a 2015 young-readers novelization of the film written by Tom Angleberger.
